battleTraits.name: Lightning-Strike Arrival
battleTraits.lore: With a clap of thunder, Yndrasta and her allies strike down onto the battlefield.
battleTraits.effect: Set up this unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 6" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Scions of the Storm
battleTraits.lore: Upon blessed bolts of lightning do the Stormcast Eternals ride to war, the furious rumble of thunder heralding their arrival.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that is **in the** **Celestial Realm**.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: The Celestial Realm
battleTraits.lore: In High Azyr, the Stormcast Eternals await their call to deliver retribution.
battleTraits.declare: If there are more friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units on the battlefield than there are set up in reserve, pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve **in the Celestial Realm**. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Their Finest Hour
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Stormcast Eternals are bastions of hope for the forces of Order. In times of desperate need, each fighter does what is necessary to keep their enemies at bay.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that has not used this ability this battle to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for that unit’s combat attacks and add 1 to save rolls for that unit.

battleTraits.name: Heavens-sent
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: More reinforcements are sent down from Azyr in their fellow warriors’ time of need.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-****UNIQUE** STORMCAST ETERNALS **INFANTRY**** or ****CAVALRY**** unit that started the battle with 2 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Shield of Azyr
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Roaring oaths to Sigmar, these warriors are surrounded by an aura of divine protection.
battleTraits.effect: Until the start of your next turn, that unit has **WARD (5+)**.

battleTraits.name: Storm Charge
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: These warriors are driven forward by their faith, ever eager to bring Sigmar’s holy retribution to his enemies.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can use ****CHARGE**** abilities this turn even if it used a ****RUN**** ability in the same turn.

regimentAbilities.name: Blaze of Glory
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: As these warriors are struck down, Sigmar’s holy lightning wreaks devastation around them before they are called back to the heavens to be Reforged.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is in combat.
regimentAbilities.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit is slain, make a **vengeance roll** of D6. On a 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on an enemy unit in combat with that unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Strike Where Needed
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared a RETREAT ability
regimentAbilities.lore: Though often outnumbered by their foes, the Stormcast Eternals are accustomed to fighting on many fronts and focusing their efforts where they will have the greatest impact.
regimentAbilities.effect: No mortal damage is inflicted on that unit by that ****RETREAT**** ability. In addition, that unit can still use ****CHARGE**** abilities this turn even though it used a ****RETREAT**** ability.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Morrda's Talon
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Enemies of the God-King know this weapon by name and fear its keen blade.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Quicksilver Draught
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This potion lends uncanny speed to the one who imbibes it.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Hallowed Scrolls
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Sacred parchments inscribed with Sigmarite blessings adorn this warrior.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Null Pendant
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This dark amulet holds magic within that can sap the resolve of the enemy.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Roll a dice for each enemy unit contesting the same objective as your general.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: On a 2+, subtract the roll from the control score of that enemy unit this turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Dazzling Radiance
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Yndrasta’s god-touched brilliance can call stranded Stormcast souls into the fray once more.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick your general to use this ability if they were set up this phase.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: You can return 1 slain model to each friendly unit wholly within 12" of your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: The Prime Huntress
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Yndrasta relishes hunting the mightiest and most terrifying quarry.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: The Damage characteristic of **Thengavar** (Yndrasta’s spear) is 2D6 for attacks that target a ****MONSTER****.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Strike with the Tempest's Rage
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Yndrasta’s enemies know that to catch her gaze is to be marked for annihilation.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Your general has **STRIKE-FIRST** if they charged in the same turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Hawk of the Celestial Skies
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The sight of Yndrasta’s seraphic form inspires her warriors with immeasurable resolve.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly units while they are wholly within 12" of your general.

regimentOfRenown.name: Hunter's Cohesion
regimentOfRenown.lore: The Horizon Seekers have long roamed the wilderness together, operating in well-honed unison to run circles around the foe.
regimentOfRenown.effect:
Each time this Regiment of Renown's **Lord-Aquilor** uses its 'Ride the Winds Aetheric' ability, you can pick all units in this Regiment of Renown that are not in combat to be the targets.

In addition, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this Regiment of Renown's **Lord-Aquilor** and ****Vanguard-Palladors**** units that target a **HUNTED** enemy unit.

**Designer's Note:** *See the 'Astral Compass' ability on the Vanguard-Hunters warscroll to see how an enemy unit can become* **HUNTED**.

regimentOfRenown.name: Hour of Retribution
regimentOfRenown.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
regimentOfRenown.lore: Aldus Valnir and Ortana dive down from the clouds into the midst of the reelingfoe, using the shock of their sudden assault to inflict maximum damage.
regimentOfRenown.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by units in this Regiment of Renown.
• Add 1 to save rolls for units in this Regiment of Renown.

heroicTraits.name: Staunch Defender
heroicTraits.lore: To contest the sacred grounds of Sigmar is to invoke the almighty power of Azyr.
heroicTraits.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective in friendly territory, add 3 to the control scores of all friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units contesting that objective.

heroicTraits.name: Envoy of the Heavens
heroicTraits.lore: When a Stormcast Eternal is laid low, the light that carries the warrior’s soul back to Azyr invigorates those who fight on.
heroicTraits.declare: If a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit was destroyed in the previous turn, pick a visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit wholly within 12"of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: The target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

heroicTraits.name: Shock and Awe
heroicTraits.lore: When this warrior and their Stormcasts take to the field, their shining visages strike fear into the foe.
heroicTraits.effect:
Each time this unit is set up using the 'Scions of the Storm' ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit for the rest of the battle round.

In addition, each time a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit is set up wholly within 12"of this unit using the 'Scions of the Storm' ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target that unit for the rest of the battle round.

artefactsOfPower.name: Quicksilver Draught
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: This potion lends uncanny speed to the one who imbibes it.
artefactsOfPower.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Null Pendant
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
artefactsOfPower.lore: This dark amulet holds magic within that can sap the resolve of the enemy.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Subtract 5 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Mirrorshield
artefactsOfPower.lore: This shield reflects the rays of Hysh in questing beams that seek out the eyes of enemy marksmen.
artefactsOfPower.effect: This unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks unless the attacking model is within 9" of it.

abilities.name: Bless Weapons
abilities.lore: The priest imbues the weapons of their brethren with the pure essence of the storm.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS INFANTRY** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn. If the chanting roll was 12+, this ability affects all visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units wholly within 12" of the chanter.

abilities.name: Translocation
abilities.lore: The priest summons bolts of lightning to transport nearby warriors across the battlefield.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target that unit for the rest of the battle round.

abilities.name: Healing Storm
abilities.lore: The priest calls down cleansing bolts from the sky, their invigorating energies closing even the most grievous wounds.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3)** the target. If the chanting roll was 8+, **Heal (D3)** each visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit wholly within 12" of the chanter instead.

abilities.name: Summon Celestian Vortex
abilities.lore: The wizard casts a pair of ensorcelled hammers into the air, which begin to spin. As the vortex gets more intense, the hammers multiply to form a maelstrom of skull-crushing force.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Celestian Vortex** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Celestian Vortex** wholly within 18" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Everblaze Comet
abilities.lore: Reaching an arm to the heavens, the wizard calls down a pure comet of Azyrite energy that crashes into the foe’s ranks with devastating effect.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Everblaze Comet** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up an **Everblaze Comet** wholly within 18" of the caster.

abilities.name: Summon Dais Arcanum
abilities.lore: The wizard calls down a single bolt of lightning to strike the ground at their feet, leaving behind a perfect sigmarite disc for a chosen Stormcast to mount and be carried into the air.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Dais Arcanum** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS INFANTRY HERO** that does not have **FLY** and is wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Dais Arcanum** within ½" of the target, visible to the caster and not in combat. Then, remove the target from the battlefield and place it on the platform of that **Dais Arcanum**.

abilities.name: Thundershock
abilities.lore: The wizard unleashes the power of Sigmar's storm as a wave of pure force, leaving the foe stunned and disoriented.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Starfall
abilities.lore: Gazing towards the heavens, the wizard hurls meteoric rain into the enemy's path, forcing them to turn an aggressive push into a cautious advance.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy **INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Lightning Blast
abilities.lore: The wizard releases pent-up storm energy into the foe, the tang of ozone and the stench of charred flesh filling the air as their enemies are burned and blasted by crackling arcs of lightning.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then pick the closest visible enemy unit to them that has not been picked to be the target of this ability this turn to be the target. If 2 or more visible enemy units are tied to be the closest, you can pick which is the target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Cycle of the Storm
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn
abilities.lore: Masters of the Reforging process, the most experienced members of the Sacrosanct chambers can focus their power to restore mortally wounded comrades before they are called back to Azyr, allowing them to continue the fight at hand.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SACROSANCT CHAMBER** unit that had models slain in this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Return 1 slain model to the target unit.

abilities.name: Synchronised Strikes
abilities.lore: The core of a Thunderhead Host is often made up of fighters from the Warrior chambers; having trained relentlessly with the sworn brethren of their Stormhost, they operate like a well-oiled cogfort.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **WARRIOR CHAMBER** units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly non-**HERO** non-**BEAST STORMCAST ETERNALS** units that do not have the **WARRIOR CHAMBER** keyword.

abilities.name: Oncoming Storm
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: First to the fight, the Lightning Echelon is akin to a spear-thrust into the heart of the enemy. Deployed only in times of great need, they smash into the foe’s vanguard with the force of an oncoming tempest.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **EXTREMIS CHAMBER** unit that charged this turn.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, that unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Ancient Aura
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Storm-charged energy ebbs and flows around the warriors of the Ruination chamber, surrounding them in a scouring aura of power. Finding purchase with a weapon on these ancient heroes can be a difficult task for even the mightiest of mortal foes.
abilities.effect: That unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Peerless Manouvres
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: These warriors are the precision weapon of the God-King, skilled at manipulating a battlefield in their favour by feinting from view and reappearing where they are needed most.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **VANGUARD CHAMBER** unit that did not use a **MOVE** ability this turn and is not in combat.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.
